verses.verse: I love <WH157> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, because he hath heard <WH8085> <WH8799> my voice <WH6963> and my supplications <WH8469>.
Because he hath inclined <WH5186> <WH8689> his ear <WH241> unto me, therefore will I call <WH7121> <WH8799> upon him as long as I live <WH3117>.

The sorrows <WH2256> of death <WH4194> compassed <WH661> <WH8804> me, and the pains <WH4712> of SH'ol <WH7585> gat hold <WH4672> <WH8804> upon me: I found <WH4672> <WH8799> trouble <WH6869> and sorrow <WH3015>.
Then called <WH7121> <WH8799> I upon the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>; O YY <WH3068>, I beseech <WH577> thee, deliver <WH4422> <WH8761> my soul <WH5315>.
Gracious <WH2587> is the YY <WH3068>, and righteous <WH6662>; yea, our 'Elohim <WH430> is merciful <WH7355> <WH8764>.
The YY <WH3068> preserveth <WH8104> <WH8802> the simple <WH6612>: I was brought low <WH1809> <WH8804>, and he helped <WH3467> <WH8686> me.
Return <WH7725> <WH8798> unto thy rest <WH4494>, O my soul <WH5315>; for the YY <WH3068> hath dealt bountifully <WH1580> <WH8804> with thee.
For thou hast delivered <WH2502> <WH8765> my soul <WH5315> from death <WH4194>, mine eyes <WH5869> from tears <WH1832>, and my feet <WH7272> from falling <WH1762>.
I will walk <WH1980> <WH8691> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>.
I believed <WH539> <WH8689>, therefore have I spoken <WH1696> <WH8762>: I was greatly <WH3966> afflicted <WH6031> <WH8804>:
I said <WH559> <WH8804> in my haste <WH2648> <WH8800>, All men <WH120> are liars <WH3576> <WH8802>.
What shall I render <WH7725> <WH8686> unto the YY <WH3068> for all his benefits <WH8408> toward me?
I will take <WH5375> <WH8799> the cup <WH3563> of salvation <WH3444>, and call <WH7121> <WH8799> upon the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>.
I will pay <WH7999> <WH8762> my vows <WH5088> unto the YY <WH3068> now in the presence of all his people <WH5971>.
Precious <WH3368> in the sight <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068> is the death <WH4194> of his saints <WH2623>.
O YY <WH3068>, truly <WH577> I am thy servant <WH5650>; I am thy servant <WH5650>, and the son <WH1121> of thine handmaid <WH519>: thou hast loosed <WH6605> <WH8765> my bonds <WH4147>.
I will offer <WH2076> <WH8799> to thee the sacrifice <WH2077> of thanksgiving <WH8426>, and will call <WH7121> <WH8799> upon the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>.
I will pay <WH7999> <WH8762> my vows <WH5088> unto the YY <WH3068> now in the presence of all his people <WH5971>,
In the courts <WH2691> of the YY'S <WH3068> house <WH1004>, in the midst <WH8432> of thee, O Yerushalayim <WH3389>. Praise <WH1984> <WH8761> ye the YY <WH3050>.
